problems.title: Transpose Matrix Using Pointers
problems.description: Transpose a 2D matrix (swap rows and columns) using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print transposed matrix (c rows, r columns)

problems.title: Sum of Each Row in 2D Array
problems.description: Calculate and print sum of each row in a 2D array using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print r lines, each containing sum of that row

problems.title: Find Maximum in 2D Array
problems.description: Find the maximum element in a 2D array using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers

problems.title: Diagonal Sum of Matrix
problems.description: Calculate sum of both diagonals in a square matrix using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (matrix size)
Next n lines: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print sum of primary diagonal, then sum of secondary diagonal

problems.title: Matrix Multiplication Using Pointers
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r1 c1 (dimensions of matrix 1)
Next r1 lines: c1 space-separated integers
Next line: r2 c2 (dimensions of matrix 2, where c1 = r2)
Next r2 lines: c2 space-separated integers

problems.title: Rotate Matrix 90 Degrees
problems.description: Rotate a square matrix 90 degrees clockwise using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (matrix size)
Next n lines: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Search in 2D Array
problems.description: Search for an element in a 2D array and return its position using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers
Last line: target element

problems.title: Swap Rows in Matrix
problems.description: Swap two rows in a 2D matrix using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers
Last line: row1 row2 (0-indexed rows to swap)

problems.title: Boundary Elements of Matrix
problems.description: Print all boundary elements of a 2D matrix using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print boundary elements in clockwise order, space-separated

problems.title: Sum of Each Column
problems.description: Calculate and print sum of each column in a 2D array using pointers.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r c (rows and columns)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers
